name: Format\TableStyle
description: The object for defining a style for rows, columns, cells, and headers in a table.

properties.name: cells
properties.description: Defines the styling for individual cells in a table.

properties.name: columns
properties.description: Defines the styling for table columns.

properties.name: headerCells
properties.description: Defines the styling for individual cells in table headers.

properties.name: headerColumns
properties.description: Defines the styling for the table header columns, which are present if dataOrientation is set to vertical, which is the default.

properties.name: headerRows
properties.description: Defines the styling for table header rows, which are present if dataOrientation is set to horizontal, which is not the default

properties.name: rows
properties.description: Defines the styling for table rows.
